_header: What thing resteth now not and then among
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 1835; Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988 TP 2137.
_description: On the need for rest — a couplet

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
What thing resteth not now & then amongeBut still travayleth
                    cannot endure longe
DULCosViii9.Note: Added by a hand of the sixteenth century.
